content: The raffle is being hosted on Gleam. Feel free to enter as anon as you like, we'll just need a real address if you win. Good luck!Enter Here: https://gleam.io/N8CwK/bitcoin-trading-cards-black-friday-giveawayThere were only 21k of these packs produced! You could pull a 21 Club card, only 21 of each will ever be made. These cards have sold for up to $5,000 (equivalent in BTC at the time).This is the prize: https://btc-tc.com/products/presale-series-two-fud-busters-edition-packs-only-21-000-packs
